Related Papers

  • W. Scacchi, Redesigning Contracted Service Procurement for Internet-based Electronic Commerce: A Case Study, J. Information and Technology Management, to appear, 2001.

  • J. Noll and W. Scacchi, Process-Oriented Hypertext for Organizational Computing, J. Network and Computing Applications, 24(1):39-61, 2001.

  • W. Scacchi and J. Noll, Process-Driven Intranets: Life Cycle Support for Process Reengineering. IEEE Internet Computing, 1(5):42-49, 1997.
